description.p: Nick Carraway is lured into the lavish world of his neighbor, Jay Gatsby. Soon enough, the cracks of Gatsby's nouveau riche existence reveal a world of obsession, madness, and tragedy.
A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing to win the affection of his dream girl. To find it he must discover the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.
On the last day of the first manned mission to Mars, a crew member of Tantalus Base believes he has made an astounding discovery: fossilized evidence of bacterial life.
Fearless optimist Anna teams up with Kristoff and a hilarious snowman named Olaf in a race to find Anna's sister Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom in eternal winter.
In a not so distant future, Theodore purchases a newly designed operating system. To the lonely writer’s surprise, a romantic relationship develops between him and his operating system.
When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of the mysterious Dragon Rider, they find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.
A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer.
When Gru has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.
The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.
Nick Carraway is lured into the lavish world of his neighbor, Jay Gatsby. Soon enough, the cracks of Gatsby's nouveau riche existence reveal a world of obsession, madness, and tragedy.
